greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of partitions of n into distinct decimal repdigit numbers.
comment: Not the same as A091581: a(n) < A091581(n) for n > 101.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..20000 (first 1001 terms from Reinhard Zumkeller)
program: p (k:ks) m = if m < k then 0 else p ks (m - k) + p ks m
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 03 2003
ext: a(0)=1 added and offset adjusted by _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Dec 10 2011
